JobFullDesc: Microsoft Services is seeking CRM Consultant to join the Business Application Domain team. The mission of our team is to Accelerate CRM market share growth in the enterprise by, delivering successful customer projects, with our strategic partners. Business Applications Domain provides delivery of Consulting assistance and project management for the top critical business solution implementations based on Dynamics 365 CRM in the enterprise. This is a unique opportunity for the right individual who possesses a technical CRM background, strong project and business solutions experience. The CRM Consultant applies advanced analysis skills, communication skills and experience in the domain of CRM solutions to define appropriate customer solutions, to develop detailed solutions and estimates for customer implementations. The candidate is used to communicate in many levels from deep technical details to C-level management. The ideal candidate will have a track record of technical excellence with the proven ability to map customer business challenges to end-to-end technology solutions. This person will have demonstrated the ability to engage in level technology discussions related to business agility, IT value, and CRM technologies.ResponsibilitiesRole Overview: Business Applications Domain CRM Consultant helps customer account teams identify, pursue and close strategic business development opportunities while leading the delivery of ongoing projects.   Consultants are key enablers for Enterprise Services and Microsoft Partner teams. The Dynamics CRM  Consultant applies advanced analysis skills and experience in principals of CRM application design to define appropriate customer solutions. A Dynamics CRM  Consultant routinely acts as subject matter expert, assisting customers, partners and Microsoft teams in the most critical and difficult implementations.  Consultants are able to deliver effective strategic presentations to audiences of all sizes and possess excellent communication skills.
